```{r message=FALSE }
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
library(readr)
library(skimr)
library(kableExtra)
library(flextable)
library(dplyr)  
library(tm)
library(glmnet)
```
```{r}
data <- read_csv("~/STATISTIC 631/competition one/activity04-mini-competition/competition-files/data/news.csv")

# Create a flextable with the first 5 rows
flextable(tail(data, 5))
```

```{r}
skim(data)
```
```{r}
data <- data %>%
  mutate(year = lubridate::year(as.POSIXct(PublishDate, format="%m/%d/%Y %H:%M")))

```

```{r}
filtered_data <- data %>%
  filter(year == 2016) %>%
  select(-year)

#flextable(head(filtered_data, 5))

```


```{r}
hist(filtered_data$SentimentHeadline, main = "Distribution of Sentiment Headline", xlab = "Sentiment Headline")
```
